title: [Health] Study: The idea of smoking as a sociable pastime may be a myth. Smokers may become more socially isolated and lonely than non-smokers as they get older. Smoking was also associated with larger reductions in social contact, increases in social disengagement, and increases in loneliness over time.

[Medicine] Major and uplifting development in cardiovascular research: first fully functional, immortalized, and scalable source of human atrial myocytes (muscle cells of the heart). Great potential to reduce heavy reliance on animal experiments.
